title: Secure Handshake Verification
description:
After cleaning up the network, Mira wants to make sure the Wi-Fi is really safe.

Objective: Capture and verify a WPA2 handshake from the genuine AP.
dialogue: Mira: "I want to be sure our Wi-Fi is secure now. A fresh WPA2 handshake will prove the PSK is intact."
Mira: "Can you help me capture and verify a handshake from the real AP?"
hints: Force reauth on the real AP to capture a four-way handshake.
